item.title: Overview of ChatGPT and DevOps use cases
item.description: What is ChatGPT? GPT (Generative Pretrained Transformer) is a type of natural language processing (NLP) model developed by OpenAI. It is a large, powerful model that can generate human-like text based on the input it receives. It is optimized for generating responses to user input in a conversational context, and it can be trained on specific domains What is the significane of it? ¬† Sam Altman, the CEO and founder of OpenAI, recently announced the official release of the openGPT one week earlier(on November 30).

item.title: Jenkins Pipeline
item.description: What is Jenkins Pipeline ü§î Jenkins Pipeline allows us to write the Jenkins build steps in code Pipelines are robust. So if your server undergoes an unpredicted restart, the pipeline will be automatically resumed. Jenkins Pipelines support big projects. You can run many jobs, and even use pipelines in a loop Jenkins Pipeline format Jenkins Pipeline can be defined by a text file called JenkinsFile. You can implement pipeline as code using JenkinsFile, and this can be defined by using a DSL (Domain Specific Language).

item.title: Proxy vs Reverse Proxy
item.description: In this post we will see what is proxy and reverse proxy. We will also discuss the differnce between them. What is proxy? Proxy is an act where someelse doing something for you on your behalf. Simple explantion of a proxy act in the below image. What is Proxy server? It is a server that sits in front of a group of client machines. When those computers make requests to sites and services on the Internet, the proxy server intercepts those requests and then communicates with web servers on behalf of those clients, like a middleman.

item.title: Kubectl alias
item.description: Play with kubernets at ease! Alias? What,Why ü§î An alias is a (usually short) name that the shell translates into another (usually longer) name or command. Aliases allow you to define new commands by substituting a string for the first token of a simple command. It can be used to avoid typing long commands or as a means to correct incorrect input. For common patterns it can reduce keystrokes and improve efficiency.
